text: hl blghk -ayha alrswl- khabar aljmwe alkafrt almkdhbt lanbyayha, fireawn wthmwd, wama hll bihim min aleadhab walnkal, lm yuetabar alqawm bdhlk, bal aladhin kafaruu fi takdhib mutawasil kadab man qblhm, wallah qad 'ahat bihim eilmaan wqdrt, la yakhfaa ealayh minhum wamin 'aemalahum shy'. walays alquran kama zaeam almukadhibun almushrikun bi'anah shaear wshr, fkdhdhabu bh, bal hu quran eazim krym, fi lawh mhfwz, la yanaluh tabdil wala thryf
